articles.description: An interesting accessory for the Apple Watch has become available for ordering - a strap called Wristcam worth $ 299. The novelty is intended to fill the gap in the form of a built-in camera that is missing in the Apple gadget.
articles.content:
The accessory contains two integrated cameras at once. In particular, the owner is looking at a 2-megapixel module that provides the ability to record video in 1080p.

articles.title: Danger as young kids watch TikTok more than TV - Whitsunday Times
articles.description: Kids as young as six are getting their own mobiles – and it’s changing how they watch TV. But that’s creating a big problem.
articles.content:
Young children are spending more time watching online videos on sites such as YouTube and TikTok than television, research reveals.
